title: BONNAROO 2007
excerpt: What is Bonnaroo? “The Bonnaroo Music and Arts Festival (Bonnaroo, BonRoo or the ‘Roo for short) is a four day annual music festival by Superfly Productions and AC Entertainment, first held in 2002. The festival is held on a 700 acre (2.4 kmÂ²) farm in Manchester, Tennessee, 60 miles southeast of Nashville, Tennessee.” From Wikipedia: … more →
